values.name: LOC_GREAT_PERSON_INDIVIDUAL_TJATY_APEREL_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_AUTHORITARIANISM
values.description_text: +{1_Amount} Combat Strength on all Units.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_BREAK_SOUND_BARRIER_NAME
values.description_text: Sound Barrier Broken

values.name: LOC_UNIT_CETBANG_NAME
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Naval Units. Can [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillage within 2 tiles for 1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_CHEVALER_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against slower Units.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_CHEVALER_CIV_TRADITIONS_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_SHERPA_UNLOCK_NAME
values.description_text: Activate on a [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tile within 5 tiles of one of your Settlement's City Centers. The Mountain is [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improved immediately with a Highland Power Station. If the Mountain is outside your borders, a path of tiles is claimed back to the Settlement.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_CLAIM_RESOURCE_NAME
values.description_text: Activate on an unowned [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Land Resource tile within 5 tiles of one of your Settlements' Palace or City Hall. A path of tiles is claimed back to the Settlement and the [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource is improved immediately.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_COLONIST_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:Action_Move] Embarked Movement and +1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population if Settled adjacent to a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_DANTINAS_TATHA_NAME
values.description_text: Immune to flood damage.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_DHOW_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_Amount} Combat Strength on Coast.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_FOEDERATI_NAME
values.description_text: Tier 1 City-State Unique Infantry Unit. Up to 20% cheaper to purchase. Each one is slightly more expensive than the last. +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for each adjacent Military Unit.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_GENERAL_MOROZ_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_Amount} Combat Strength in Tundra

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_GHILMAN
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength and +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing in Command Radius of a [icon:UNIT_SOLTAN] Sardār.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_GOLD_BANGLES_NAME
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when fighting on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource tiles. +100% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from pillaging [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_HAMARANA_COUNCIL_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_Amount} when attacking

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_HAZARAPATIS_NAME
values.description_text: Gains the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Initiative Promotion.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_HOPLITE_NAME
values.description_text: +2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength if adjacent to another [icon:UNIT_HOPLITE] Hoplite.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_HOPLITE_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are suzerain of.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_IMMORTAL_NAME
values.description_text: Heals 15 [icon:Action_Heal] HP after defeating an enemy Unit.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_INITIATION_NAME
values.description_text: Receive 25[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when you convert a Settlement for the first time.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_IRON_CROSS_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius of a [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander that has earned at least 1 Commendation.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_KALAM_NAME
values.description_text: +1 additional attack per turn if [icon:Action_Move] Movement allows.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_KALIA_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_amount} [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_KESHIG_NAME
values.description_text: Heals 15 [icon:Action_Heal] HP after defeating an enemy Unit.

values.name: LOC_GREAT_PERSON_INDIVIDUAL_TJATY_KHAY_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength

values.name: LOC_CIVIC_KIBRAT_ARBA_I_NAME
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength to [icon:UNIT_MAGARRU] Magarru if they are in a [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.

values.name: LOC_CIVIC_KIBRAT_ARBA_I_NAME
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength to [icon:UNIT_MAGARRU] Magarru if they are in a [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_LEGION_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_LEIOMANO_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Infantry and Cavalry Units. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength defending against Naval Units.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_LEIOMANO_NAME
values.description_text: Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_MAGARRU_NAME
values.description_text: Can move after attacking and ignores Zone of Control.

values.name: LOC_CIVIC_MANDALA_NAME
values.description_text: +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Chang Beun in or adjacent to territory of [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States you are Suzerain of.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_MANDARIN_NAME
values.description_text: +100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when using the Create a Road Action.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_MANDARIN_NAME
values.description_text: Opposing Military Units in the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius receive -3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Ottru.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_MEDJAY_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_Amount} Combat Strength in friendly territory, doubled when stationed in a Settlement you own.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_NOYAN_NAME
values.description_text: +50% [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Flanking for Cavalry Units in the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_NOYAN_MOUNTED_COMBAT_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_Amount}% Flanking from Noyan

values.name: LOC_UNIT_NUMIDIAN_CAVALRY_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Unique City Resource assigned to your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_OTTRU_NAME
values.description_text: Opposing Military Units in the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius receive -3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Ottru.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_PARTISAN
values.description_text: City State Unique Infantry Unit. Each one is slightly more expensive than the last. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Civilizations with a different [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology. +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing in owned territory.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_PEDANDA_NAME
values.description_text: Receive {1_Amount}[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture when you convert a Settlement for the first time.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_PHYSICIAN_NAME
values.description_text: Use in an Infected Urban District to remove [icon:YIELD_ANGRY] Unrest from that Settlement.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_PURABHETTARAH_NAME
values.description_text: +{1_amount} Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_RIVER_RAIDS_NAME
values.description_text: [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to the other Yield or [icon:Action_Heal] Healing gained. Civilian and Support Units gain +3 [icon:Action_Move] Movement Speed while Embarked.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_SEPOY
values.description_text: Ranged attack with +20 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: LOC_CIVIC_SHIPSHEDS_NAME
values.description_text: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Naval Units at full health.

values.name: LOC_IMPROVEMENT_SHORE_BATTERY_NAME
values.description_text: City-State Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Combat Strength, +1 range to Ranged and Siege Units in this tile. +5 [icon:Action_Heal]Healing per turn to Military Units in this tile. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement adjacent to Coast.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_SLOOP_NAME
values.description_text: Can move after attacking.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_SOLTAN_NAME
values.description_text: +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement. While razing a settlement, an additional [icon:CITY_URBAN] District is Razed per turn in Settlements where this Commander is on a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District.

values.name: LOC_TRAIT_SONGHAI_ABILITY_NAME
values.description_text: When you create a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route receive an additional 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold if this is a Trade Route with at least 1 Navigable River.

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_STONE_TRAP_NAME
values.description_text: Deals 25 [icon:DAMAGED] damage to enemy Units that enter the tile and ends their [icon:Action_Move] Movement. This removes the trap. Traps are invisible to all other Civilizations until triggered. Can be placed in unowned territory. Must be placed on Flat or Vegetated Terrain.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_TAJIRO_NAME
values.description_text: When you create a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route receive 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold if this is a Trade Route with at least 1 Navigable River.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_TAJIRO_NAME
values.description_text: When you create a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route receive an additional 100[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold if this is a Trade Route with at least 1 Navigable River.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_TERCIO_NAME
values.description_text: Adjacent Units receive +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Cavalry Units (bonus is only applied once).

values.name: LOC_UNIT_TERCIO_NAME
values.description_text: Adjacent Units receive +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against Cavalry Units (bonus is only applied once).

values.name: LOC_ENHANCER_BELIEF_BONUS_10_NAME
values.description_text: +5 Inter Caetera

values.name: LOC_ABILITY_TREASURE_FLEET_NAME
values.description_text: Is captured by attacker when defeated in combat.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_TURTANU_NAME
values.description_text: Infantry and Cavalry Units within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius have +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_VIKINGR_NAME
values.description_text: [icon:Action_Pillage] Coastal Raiding grants [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% the [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold gained.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_WARAKAQ_NAME
values.description_text: Rough Terrain does not end its [icon:Action_Move] Movement. +5 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength when attacking from Rough Terrain.

values.name: LOC_GREAT_PERSON_INDIVIDUAL_LOGIOS_XENOPHON_NAME
values.description_text: +3 Combat Strength

values.name: LOC_UNIT_XUNLEICHONG_NAME
values.description_text: +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength in Featureless tiles. Has a [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged attack.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_XUNLEICHONG_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength to Ranged Units adjacent to the Xunleichong.

values.name: LOC_UNIT_XUNLEICHONG_NAME
values.description_text: +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength to Ranged Units adjacent to the Xunleichong.
